text: 6. The method according to claim 5, wherein in the step (2), the pH of the reaction kettle bottom liquid is adjusted to 12-12.4; in the step (4), the pH value of the reaction kettle system is controlled to be 12-12.4; the strong alkali solution is a sodium hydroxide solution with the mass fraction of 24% -32%; the feeding flow rate of the strong alkali solution takes the pH value of the reaction system as a control standard.
